TestCase.name: testSimpleWatermarkPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, c FROM VirtualTable

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($3, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[+($2, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])
TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, watermark=[-(+($2, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND), 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testWatermarkWithUdf
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a - b FROM UdfTable

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[-($0, $1)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[func(func($3, $0), $0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[func($2, $0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, UdfTable]])
Calc(select=[(a - b) AS EXPR$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, UdfTable, watermark=[func(func(func($2, $0), $0), $0)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testWatermarkOnComputedColumnExcludedRowTime2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, SECOND(d) FROM VirtualTable

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], EXPR$2=[EXTRACT(FLAG(SECOND), $3)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($3, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[+($2, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])

Calc(select=[a, b, EXTRACT(FLAG(SECOND), CAST(Reinterpret((c + 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)))) AS EXPR$2]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, watermark=[-(+($2, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND), 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testWatermarkOnNestedRowWithNestedProjection
TestCase.Resource: select c.e, c.d from NestedTable

LogicalProject(e=[$2.d.e], d=[$2.d]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[g], watermark=[-($3, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], g=[$2.d.f]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NestedTable]])
Calc(select=[c.d.e AS e, c.d AS d]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NestedTable, project=[c], watermark=[-($0.d.f, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]]], fields=[c])

TestCase.name: testWatermarkWithMetadata
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM MyTable

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], originTime=[$3], rowtime=[TO_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(/($3, 1000)), _UTF-16LE'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[a, b]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[a, b, originTime], watermark=[TO_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(/($2, 1000)), _UTF-16LE'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')]]], fields=[a, b, originTime])

TestCase.name: testWatermarkOnComputedColumnExcluedRowTime1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM VirtualTable WHERE b > 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($3, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[+($2, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])
Calc(select=[a, b], where=[(b > 10)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, watermark=[-(+($2, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND), 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
